Order.CustomerOrderNewNumberTemplate.description:
Used to generate new customer order number, with parameters:

0: Date and Time in UTC
1: Counter

Format supports counter options directly within the template using the format:
<number_template>@<reset_counter_type>[:<start_counter_from>[:<counter_increment>]]

Default values:
* Daily for reset_counter_type. Choose from None, Daily, Weekly, Monthly, and Yearly reset counter types.
* 1 for start_counter_from.
* 1 for counter_increment.

Example: CO{0:yyMMdd}-{1:D5}@Weekly:1:10.
Result: CO240101-00001.
Order.CustomerOrderNewNumberTemplate.title: Order number template

Order.ShipmentNewNumberTemplate.title: Order shipment number template
